0.text: Hello there! My name is Bartek, and this is my portfolio website :)

2.text: Maybe before I show you my projects I will tell you something about me.

3.text: I am 21 years old student of Computer Science on University of Technology in City of Łódź in Poland.

4.text: Right now everything what you can see here is what I learned myself.

5.text: Okay.. thats enough about me, if you want more you can check my CV down below somewhere.

6.text: In right panel you should see my projects (not all, but 'the best' of what I can show in public ;) )

7.text: I have to go now. If anything here was interesting for you feel free to contact me here:
